name.ja: <ruby>妖竜の禁姫<rt>フィーリア・レギス</rt></ruby>

text.en:
1 Dragon Fusion Monster + 1 Level 7 or higher Dragon monster
During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can target 1 card your opponent controls or in their GY; banish it, then, if it was banished from the field, return 1 Dragon monster you control to the hand. At the start of your opponent's Battle Phase, if this card is in your GY: You can return 1 Dragon monster you control to the hand/Extra Deck, and if you do, Special Summon this card. You can only use each effect of "Philia Regis" once per turn.
